title: New: Star Slinger – They Like It Slow (H-Town/Star Slinger Refix)
content:
If you’ve been a long follower of Crack in the Road then you’ll know how much we love Manchester beat-making maestro Star Slinger. If this is your first time hearing of him, then you’re in for a treat! Rapidly garnering a hardcore following both in the UK and abroad, his debut record Volume 1 dropped last year, and since then he’s hardly stopped producing new remixes and tracks, as well as playing a score of shows around Europe. Today he dropped a new remix, set to be included in upcoming live sets, a chilled out, laid back take of H-Town’s They Like It Slow. Like much of his previous work it maintains a soulful vibe, despite being instantaneously catchy and danceable. Check it out and download below.

H-Town – They Like It Slow (Star Slinger Refix) by Star Slinger
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
